bibl.title: The Alexandrian Bishop and the Grain Trade: Ecclesiastical Commerce in Late Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: From the 4th to the early 7th centuries. An important concern will be to determine whether the rich documentation at the end of the period accurately reflects earlier conditions.
bibl.seg: Hollerich Michael J., The Alexandrian Bishop and the Grain Trade: Ecclesiastical Commerce in Late Roman Egypt.
From the 4th to the early 7th centuries. An important concern will be to determine whether the rich documentation at the end of the period accurately reflects earlier conditions.
